snippet: After dropping out of a rock band that would eventually become Blue Öyster Cult, Jeff Kagel changed his name to Krishna Das, took up Indian devotional music and became a celebrity.
abstract: After dropping out of a rock band that would eventually become Blue Öyster Cult, Jeff Kagel changed his name to Krishna Das, took up Indian devotional music and became a celebrity.

headline.main: Ex-Rocker Finds a Different Path to Fame, Chanting All the Way
headline.print_headline: Ex-Rocker Finds a Different Path to Fame: Chants
